content:
Grad increase the fidelity:L->Storyboard, Pproto, dig mockup, static html, dynam html,H-> 
Prototype: A prototype is an early sample, model, or release of a product built to test a concept or process or to act as a thing to be replicated or learned from. Prototyping serves to provide specifications for a real, working system rather than a theoretical one. 
Paper Prototype: 1)Fixed components (the window frame) 2)variable components(major components that occur regularly, screens, menus, dialog boxes. 3)Dynamic Components: things based entirely on individual interaction (gen on fly)
